name: Solidify Earth
area: up to two 10-foot cubes per level (S)
text: Stone, dirt, and other types of earth within the area become more tightly packed. Burrowing creature (including those using earth glide) treat the area as difficult terrain. Any creature that begins its turn burrowing in the affected area becomes entangled for 1 round (Reflex negates). Tremorsense and similar senses are ineffective within the affected area. Creatures with the earth mastery special ability (such as earth elementals) double their bonus on attack and damage rolls so long as both they and their targets are touching the area affected by this spell.
area_zh: 每等级至多两个10尺立方体 (可变)
savingThrow_zh: 反射, 通过则无效; 见文本
text_zh: 此区域内的岩石、泥土与其他种类的土壤变得更为紧密结实。掘地(Burrowing)的生物(包含那些使用潜地能力(earth glide)的)将视此区域为困难地形。任何生物在回合开始时，在此受影响区域进行掘地会被纠缠1轮(反射，通过则无效)。震颤感知(Tremorsense)以及类似的感知能力于此区域内无效。有着掌控大地(earth mastery)这特殊能力的生物(像是土元素)，只要该生物与他的目标都接触被此法术所影响的区域时，将加值翻倍加于攻击骰与伤害骰。
